items.content:
Negations - Simple present
Take a look at the 'Kennisbank'.
Learn how and when you apply the simple present in the negation (= ontkennende) form.

Grammar: Negations - Simple present


Do the following exercises.

Remember your scores for your work plan.

content.body:
Maak een ontkennende zin door de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to do' (don't, doesn't)

of 'to be' (isn't, aren't, 'm not) in te vullen.

  • You drink mineral wine.
  • Your teacher check your home work.
  • We live in Amsterdam.
  • Gary and Ken have a pet.
  • I live in Rotterdam.
  • He have a dog.
  • You play football.
  • Your cat climb trees.
  • I sick, that's for sure.
  • She quite right, is she?
  • We leaving at 9.30 pm.
  • They quite up to it.
  • They brothers.
  • We the champions.
  • She a nice teacher.
  • I 11 years old.

Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • I - this. - fun - can - see - the - not - in .

values.value: I can not see the fun in this

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • They - us. - not - will - help .

Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • We - lots - money. - not - got - have - of .

values.value: We have not got lots of money

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • We - wear - uniform. - not- a - will .

values.value: We will not wear a uniform

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • Charles - is - boyfriend. - Amy's - not .

Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • We - going - are - tonight.- cinema - not - to - the .

values.value: We are not going to the cinema tonight

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • My - like - fries. - does - dad - not - French .

values.value: My dad does not like French fries

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

  • This - minutes. - fifty - not - last - lesson - does .

values.value: This lesson does not last fifty minute

items.content:
Grammar test
To round up the grammar items, you are going to do a final test.
When you get the certificate you have finished the grammar for this theme!

Remember your score for your work plan.

Click to begin.

Succes! Good luck!

prompt.body: Welke vragende zin is niet goed?

content.body: Has he had a good time?
Can I stay at your place?

prompt.body: In welke zin is 'to be' verkeerd gebruikt?

content.body: Am I the only one here?
Are a Dutch pancake very cheap?

prompt.body:
Wat kan op de puntjes?
Kathy ...... in the supermarket. She ...... in a bar.

Wat kan op de puntjes?
...... she ...... in Amsterdam?

Welke zin betekent hetzelfde?
John helps his sister to do the dishes.

content.body: Him helps she to do the dishes.
Him helps her to do the dishes.
He helps she to do the dishes.
He helps her to do the dishes.

prompt.body:
Welke zin betekent hetzelfde?
The boys are watching the football game.

Welke zin betekent hetzelfde?
Sue helps her friends every day.

items.content:
The last 5 minutes of every lesson ...........

  • Have you filled in your workplan yet?
  • Write down in your notebook what went right and what was difficult.
  • Did you learn new words? If so, are they already in your notebook, to learn at home.
  • Continue with Duolingo.

• Rehearse all words and chunks of Animals and Pets at WRTS
  • Rehearse all grammar of Animals and Pets - also see the study planner Grammar in Magister
  • Rehearse exercises you think you haven't done very well
